title: Cannot access in-game shop's "Gameplay" section
body: Title says it all. All the other sections open up fine, but except the "Gameplay" section where you would purchase runes.

replies.body:
It is working fine now. 

thanks for the speedy fix mods.
Team's aware.  Not sure yet if it's the same issue as yesterday causing it, but we're investigating now.
Me too.Trying to buy a rune, and can't.
Same with me... Trying to change name... Making me very angry
